players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie was found dead. Investigate Bob and Diana to uncover the mafia."
Bob: "Investigated Diana, found mafia. Will watch Bob closely."
Diana: "Will keep Bob busy, focus on Alice."
Bob: "Will observe Bob closely. Diana confirmed mafia, stay vigilant."
You: "Thanks for the updates. Bob, keep an eye on Diana too."
Diana: "Will keep Alice occupied, Bob watch out for Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Charlie was found dead. Investigate Bob and Diana to uncover the mafia."
You: "Investigated Diana, found mafia. Will watch Bob closely."
Diana: "Will keep Bob busy, focus on Alice."
You: "Will observe Bob closely. Diana confirmed mafia, stay vigilant."
Alice: "Thanks for the updates. Bob, keep an eye on Diana too."
Diana: "Will keep Alice occupied, Bob watch out for Charlie."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Charlie was found dead. Investigate Bob and Diana to uncover the mafia."
Bob: "Investigated Diana, found mafia. Will watch Bob closely."
You: "Will keep Bob busy, focus on Alice."
Bob: "Will observe Bob closely. Diana confirmed mafia, stay vigilant."
Alice: "Thanks for the updates. Bob, keep an eye on Diana too."
You: "Will keep Alice occupied, Bob watch out for Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
